tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pain in Left part of Chest,
review: Dr Nagori is very friendly, polite. He done a ECG test for diagnosis my issues. He explained my issues very well and prescribed me proper medicines. I recovered within 3days. I am very thankful to him. I recommend  to others for visit his clinic Aloka Medicare Pvt Ltd.

tags: None
review: I would recommend everyone seeking thorough analysis of your condition to visit Dr Nagori. My father is continuing his treatment under his guidance. His experience speaks for himself. Unlike most other Doctors he does not prescribe unnecesary medicines and takes so much time in the diagnosis. Really glad I found him through Practo for my father’s cardiac care.

tags: None
review:
Doctor was very impressive. Took his time to go through all the test and then explained each and every concern raised from my end.
Found it very helpful

tags: None
review:
**** *********** ***** ******* ******** ******** *** ******** Charges high for such tests.

After seeing the older prescription of Dr Deepak Dutta Dr. Nagori gave my father the same medicine's as the previous doctor(Dr. Dutta) to whom my father used to go for checkup. What  Dr. S.B.Nagori did was asked my father to do few *********** tests after which the doctor said my father is fine and prescribed the exact same medicine's as the previous doctor. **** **** ********** ***** **** *** ******** **** ***** ***** ********* ** *** *********
reply_text: I am sorry that you felt this way, but just to inform you I am practicing since 47 years. I checked you and for exact diagnosis I suggested you some cardiac investigation for proper diagnosis. I prescribed you two another medicines also. Anyways thank you very much for your opinion.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I will say that Dr. S. B. Nagori is a humble person. He treats his patients equally either you belong to rich family or not . I would say that after consulting Dr. S. B.  Nagori I feel relaxed because he not only listened my health issues carefully, he just suggested for one test ECG only and have written few medicine which should be taken from any of the medical store available in the market. After the consultation with Dr.  S. B.  Nagori I feel that he is one of the best cardiologist in Kolkatta who will never force you for unwanted test's and medicine which is not necessary for you. He just suggests whatever is necessary for your diagnosis . So I would really recommend Dr. S. B. Nagori to everyone who are suffering from any heart issues should must visit once Dr. S.B. Nagori . you will not only get best treatment, you will save your lots of money too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Treatment methodology of Dr. Nagori sir is great as he starts someone's treatment from the base then he proceed to advance level . He will definitely diagnose you with some other tests but trust me if he's recommending some tests that means the patient is going though a thorough check up under his supervision and rest assured. No doubt, from now on he's and will be a highly recommend doctor from my side. The staffs of CHRC are also cordial and always ready with their assistance to all. Thank you for the nice experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pain in Left part of Chest,Chest Pain During Exercise,
review: I went in for a chest pain and the whole process was rather smooth. The staff and the doctor was very friendly, listened to the problem clearly and assured me about my situation. The doctor went so far to make sure I was given the best treatment across and his polite behaviour made for a very good experience. Thank you so much to the whole team and Practo.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Well...What can I say..... He is an extra ordinary Doctor. He is the doctor who in most of the cases cures the patient with medicines and exercises. If the issue is so serious only then he will recommend for surgery or others. I'm more than satisfied with him and respect him so much. My father is under his care since last 2 years, and now post angioplasty done in AMRI,dhakuria he is fine. Nagori Sir is just superb....

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
**** **** * *** ** **** ******** ********* With due respect, I expected more from a doctor like him.
Without consulting patient or her family member, started number of tests. 

Further, disappointment came **** ** ****** ********** * ****** ******** ** *** **** 
Waste of time and Rs.4200.******** **** *** ***** ******* ******* ** ********
reply_text: Firstly thank you for attending my clinic. I am sorry that you felt this way. I checked him and for exact diagnosis I suggested you some cardiac investigation like Ecg, Echo & TMT not any other tests. The patient having hypertension, I prescribed two medicines also. Thank you for anyways your feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Me and my son visited this exceptionally kind *** ************* ******* We both had hypertension related concerns. From the wait time to the staff behaviour, everything was impeccable. The doctor is kind, performs a quick ECG before consultation even begins. Explained in a calm and friendly manner. Highly recommended.

review:
Dr Nagori is one of the senior most and most experienced Cardiologist in Kolkata. He was referred by one of our family friends who have been in his treatment for long. He patiently heard all  problems of my Mother and referred for some tests which were done at Calcutta Heart Research Centre itself. He then explained us the cure in easy and understandable language and gave medicine. 
Very humble person with very deep understanding. 
Thanks.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,

Their compassion and understanding also competence will be always

reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is a very polite personality and a good man is found in his behaviour. This is the greatest identity of a good doctor as well. We went to him to get his opinion on a Pacemaker Transplant issue and what would lead us to a final decision. However, he reassures us that there is no need for a pacemaker at all.  We are quite satisfied with his treatment and it is also worth mentioning that all the staff of Calcutta Heart Research Center are very good and happy to help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited doctor S B Nagori for my brother. He is great doctor, very caring & friendly also. I am very satisfied with his treatment. My brothe is well now. All staffs of his clinic are good and services are excellent. I recommend other plz to visit to him.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pain in Left part of Chest,Angiopathy,Blocked Blood Vessels,Hypertension,
review: I had done all the tests, but still when i went to the doc, the first thing i was asked to do was conduct an ECG, without which je would not treat me. He didn't prescribe any meds, he just wrote BP and one test, and that's it. *** ****** *** **** ** ******* *********** ***** ***********
reply_text: The patient had already got done a CT Angiogram of the Heart. He was insistent on whether he should go for a coronary angiogram or not and asked me to answer this specifically. Nothing else. The current position of the heart of any patient can only be known by an ECG (which by the way costs only Rs 300/-). I complied with the patient’s requirement of advising a coronary angiogram. To prescribe medicine, I need a basic diagnosis and ECG is an important part of it. If the patient comes to me with a current ECG, I am willing to provide consultation for free.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First of all the doctor is a bihari he don't speak bangali and the people who don't know hindi the doctor can't understand them .and second point the staf are very bad.i have already done a report in 3 days before which cost 4500 and the staff told me for do the report again in there own matching.i suggest plz don't go to the doctor
reply_text: Not being racist, but just to clarify I am not bihari by origin. I have been practicing in west bengal over 40 years. Even though I do not speak fluent bengali, I can still understand fully n converse a tad bit. Based on your medical evaluation, only the necessary tests were recommended as per the set medical guidelines. I am sorry if you faced any difficulty with the staff, and thank you for your valuable feedback. I will surely look into it.

reply_text: Firstly thank you for your feedback. As you were satisfied you gave a good feedback but by mistake you clicked the not recommend option. Hope this was systematic mistake. Please give a proper feedback with correct recommend option.

review: We were asked to wait in ECG room and doctor came and he was moving here and there and checking the patient he didn't explained the issue properly. I do not recommend this doctor

There have no significant in Ecg, mainly the patient's problem was overweight, diabetes & thyroid also. But the patient party was asking many questions regarding ecg only. I explained the party regarding ecg but  party was asking repeatedly many questions regarding ecg which could not be explained due to medical terminology.
